basic_information.scholarship_name: Joe E. White Jr. Endowed Scholarship in Political Science

description: This scholarship recognizes a Political Science student who shows passion and commitment to their chosen major as evidenced by strong academic performance. Eligibility Requirements Minimum 3.0 GPA Undergraduate with Junior standing Political Science major Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded
